message: Feel free to reach out! Here are the best ways to connect with me:

social.description: Email is the fastest way to reach me. I check it regularly and try to reply within a few days, sometimes sooner.
I do post on Instagram, so feel free to message me! It's also a good place to follow along if you want to see some of my interests and things I like.
LinkedIn is where I share more current updates about school projects, volunteering, and clubs I'm involved in. It's a good place to get a snapshot of what I'm busy with.
On GitHub, I share some of my coding projects and experiments. If you're curious about what I've built or am working on, you can find more details there.
Check out my Pinterest for inspiration and boards that reflect my interests and projects.

closingMessage: Thanks for stopping by! If you reach out, I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
